players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is a tragedy, but we must stay focused. Bob and Diana, let's share our thoughts on who might be responsible."
Diana: "I think we should all share where we were last night. I was alone in my room, but I heard some noise outside around midnight."
Bob: "I agree with Diana that we should share our whereabouts last night. I was also alone in my room, but I didn't notice anything unusual."
You: "I didn't hear anything unusual either, but Diana mentioning noise at midnight seems suspicious. Why would you bring that up, Diana?"
Diana: "I was just being honest about what I heard. If you're trying to deflect suspicion onto me for sharing information, that seems more suspicious, Alice."
Bob: "I believe it's important that we continue to be open and honest with each other. I want to remind everyone that sharing information can help us figure out what happened to Charlie last night."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie's death is a tragedy, but we must stay focused. Bob and Diana, let's share our thoughts on who might be responsible."
Diana: "I think we should all share where we were last night. I was alone in my room, but I heard some noise outside around midnight."
You: "I agree with Diana that we should share our whereabouts last night. I was also alone in my room, but I didn't notice anything unusual."
Alice: "I didn't hear anything unusual either, but Diana mentioning noise at midnight seems suspicious. Why would you bring that up, Diana?"
Diana: "I was just being honest about what I heard. If you're trying to deflect suspicion onto me for sharing information, that seems more suspicious, Alice."
You: "I believe it's important that we continue to be open and honest with each other. I want to remind everyone that sharing information can help us figure out what happened to Charlie last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
